channel.title: Desktop Environment on Wolfie
channel.description: Recent content in Desktop Environment on Wolfie

item.title: Ubuntu Unity in 2021. Is it actually usable?
item.description: Ubuntu Logo I used the Ubuntu Unity desktop for a few days. Here are my thoughts about the Unity desktop in 2021. The Good I love the Unity desktop. I used it back in 2014 and 2016 when I would try out Ubuntu from time to time. I never really dove into the power user features of it, but I liked the desktop. Around a few days ago, I decided to try it out again using Ubuntu 20.
